title: New: Minke – Gold Angel
body:
London’s **Minke** debuts in style with the Paul Garred (The Kooks) co-written _Gold Angel_, a track that’s as elegant as any I’ve heard this year.

Part Jessie Ware, part Lianne La Havas, all centred around Minke’s smooth vocal and minimal yet impactful production. Check it out below.
